pages.text: 67|27|Tara pichata yetiya sihamte iyaka nice'i ocarata dekha paba tetiya kaphirasakalara ceharaa mlana hai paraiba arau koraa ha’ba, ‘e'itorae'i haiche se'ito, yito tomaloke dabi karaichila’.

67|28|Koraa, koraacona tomaloke.. Yadi allahe moka arau mora sangisakalaka dhbansa karai diye athaba amara prati daya pradarsana karae, tente kaphirasakalaka yantranadayaka sastira paraa kone raksa karaiba
67|29|koraa, teraemi parama karaunamaya. Ami te'omra oparate'i imana anicho arau te'omra oparate'i bharasa karaicho. Gatike tomaloke anatipalame janibalai paba kone spasta bibhraantita ache.
67|30|Koraa, tomaloke bhabichane, yadi tomalokara pani bhugarbhata guci yaya, tetiya kone tomalokaka prabahamana pani ani diba
68|1|nuna; kalamara sapata arau sihamte yi likhe tara sapata
68|2|tomara pratipalakara anugraha ye, tumi unmada nahaya.
68|3|Arau niscaya tomara babe ache nirabicchinna puraskara.
68|4|Arau niscaya tumi mahana caraitrara ucca srngata adhisthita.
68|5|Eteke anatipalame tumi dekhibalai paba arau sihamte'o dekhibalai paba
68|7|niscaya tomara pratipalaka samyaka aragata sihamtara bisaye yihamte te'omra pathara paraa bicyuta haiche, arau te'om hidayata praaptasakalara bisaye'o samyaka paraijnata.
68|9|Sihamte kamana karae ye, tumi aposakami horaa, tente sihamte'o aposakami ha'ba.
68|10|Arau tumi anugatya nakaraiba pratyeka ene byaktira yiye adhika sapatakarai, lanchita
68|11|pithira amrata nindakarai arau yijana cogalakhurai karai phurae
68|14|e'i babe'i ye, si achila dhana-sampada arau santana-santatira adhikarai.
68|15|Yetiya tara ocarata amara ayatasamuha tilaraata karaa haya tetiya si kaya, e'ibora purbarartisakalara kalpa-kahini matra.
